pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:0.6: Ime kho panāyyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṃ karissanti, pattavāṇijjaṃ vā bhikkhuniyo karissanti, āmattikāpaṇaṃ vā pasāressantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ karontī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.7: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā— ukkaṭṭho patto, majjhimo patto, omako patto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.9: aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.11: nāḷikodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.13: patthodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.19: Nissajjitabbo saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.21: Tāya bhikkhuniyā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.22: “ayaṃ me, ayye, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.27: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo saṃghassa nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.28: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.29: Tāya bhikkhuniyā sambahulā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.30: “ayaṃ me, ayyāyo, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṃ ayyānaṃ nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.35: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo ayyānaṃ nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.36: Yadi ayyānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ayyāyo, imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.1.37: Tāya bhikkhuniyā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.2.11: Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:2.3.2: antoaruṇe adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, bhijjati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo nissaṭṭhapattaṃ na denti.
